name: BriteHome
0:
”Alexa, turn off Kitchen Lamp”
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen Lamp”
”Alexa, dim Kitchen Lamp by 5%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: If you have a Brite Home Smart Dimmer WizSwitch, you can use the skill to control the light connected to the switch in the Smart Home section of the Alexa app or through Alexa voice commands. The skill allows you to interact with the light using commands such as 'Alexa, turn on Kitchen Lamp', 'Alexa, dim Kitchen Lamp by 5%' or 'Alexa, brighten Kitchen Lamp by 5%'
